actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that any member in committee may demand a roll call vote on any matter, and that a roll call vote shall be required on any motion to report a bill or resolution from committee.

summary.text: Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to require a roll call vote on demand of any committee member on any question before the committee and on every motion to report any bill or resolution of a public character.

titles.title: Resolution to amend rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that any member in committee may demand a roll call vote on any matter, and that a roll call vote shall be required on any motion to report a bill or resolution from committee.
